mapper.select: select member.nickname, member.userid, C.status from friend left join ( select A.*, memberLog.status from (select max(id) as maxId, memberId from memberLog group by memberId) A join memberLog on A.maxId = memberLog.id ) C on C.memberId = friend.user2 join member on member.id = friend.user2 where friend.user1 = #{id}
select id, userid, nickname from member where nickname like '%' || #{search} || '%' or userid like '%' || #{search} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into friendRequest (sender, receiver, state) values (#{sender}, #{receiver}, '0')
mapper.select: select friendRequest.id, member.userid, member.nickname from friendRequest join member on member.id = friendRequest.receiver where friendRequest.state = 0
mapper.update: update friendRequest set state = #{state} where id = #{id}
